OrgName.entry: ASSISTED TRAVEL DEPARTMENT - EAST MIDLANDS TRAINS

Desc.entry: Provides timetable information and arranges assistance for elderly or disabled people who need help with rail travel from Sheffield Midland Station or from any EMT station or on/off any EMT service. Allow 48 hours notice - negotiable for emergencies. Gives information on accessible trains and stations. Also provides a credit or debit card booking service.

ContactName.entry: Jane Brooks/David Walters, Assisted Travel Team
